name: Western Hero
description:
In the wild west, fame builds up quick. People will know you. Both friend and foe.

As your name spreads by the desert, more of them will come. But you will be prepared, your bullets will give’em a warm welcome.

As people start to live near you, protect them, watch out for them.

Your name, your fame is all you have. Play close attention to it, always…

A game developed for LudumDare 40!

Controls!
  • [Mouse] - AIM
  • [CLICK] - FIRE
  • [W A S D] - MOVEMENT
Tools!
  • Unity 3d
  • AssetForge From Kenney (http://www.kenney.nl/)
